DOC.detailed_description: The long term goal trial determine intervention subject extensive mammographic density ( risk factor breast cancer ) low fat-high carbohydrate diet reduce incidence breast cancer 37 % . We propose meet goal carry randomize multi-centre trial dietary intervention subject increase risk breast cancer progress . A control group receive general advice nutrition counsel change intake dietary fat carbohydrate , intervention group give intensive counsel reduce intake total fat target 15 % calorie increase intake carbohydrate maintain intake total calorie . Recruitment trial progress Toronto , Hamilton , London Windsor since 1991 , Vancouver since 1994 , 4,615 subject require trial recruit November 1998 . The trial explanatory seek determine biological effect dietary fat reduction term reduction breast cancer incidence .
